metadata.title: CVE-2024-11477 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
[Unknown description]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-11477` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

7zip - 24.08+dfsg-1
7zip-standalone - 24.08+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 7zip package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '24.08+dfsg-1').
